title: Easy recipes - quick & easy recipes
description:
Easy recipes - quick & easy recipes app offers you many quick and light recipes. These include salad recipes, drink recipes, soup recipes, dessert recipes, stew recipes, casserole recipes, recipes for appetizer and recipes for cake.
Festive recipes
Our recipe team has curated a collection of tasty recipes for New Year 2020. Enjoy the new year 2020 party with easy and quick recipes.
Popular quick recipes of the month
Recipes like blue corn beer chicken taco soup, waldorf salad, broccoli, summer panzanella, ramen noodles soup, lebanese grilled chicken recipe with garlic, microwave brownies and mexican corn salad are popular in December.
Simple fast recipe instructions with picture
Every beginner recipe has easy step by step instructions with a photo. Get many healthy recipes for free in our Easy recipes - quick & easy recipes app. Unlike other recipes app, Easy recipes - quick & easy recipes can be used offline. This makes our free recipes app for Android a perfect fit for your kitchen.
Collect favourite easy recipes
Add your favourite quick recipes to the app's favourites section. You can use the saved fast recipes offline. You can also create beginner recipe collections on the basis of non-vegetarian, breakfast ideas, lunch ideas, cooking style, cooking and prep time etc.
Easy Recipe search
Find recipes by simple search with the name of a recipe or by ingredients used. You can search for quick recipes with the ingredients you have. We also have Thanksgiving recipes, Christmas recipes, Halloween recipes and other recipe categories for special occasions.
Convert ingredients to a recipe
Our food recipes app lets you cook with ingredients you have. Cook by ingredients feature lets you search and discover fast recipes you can cook with ingredients in your kitchen/refrigerator.
Tastes, allergies and diets
We often have beginner recipes for people following keto, vegan, gluten-free and vegetarian diets. If you're suffering from any food allergies, we have peanut-free recipes, seafood-free recipes, wheat-free recipes, egg-free recipes and dairy-free. Nutritional information like cholesterol, carbs, fat and calories are available in the Easy recipes - quick & easy recipes app.
Create Meal plans
Meal planning is going to be easy and tasty with Easy recipes - quick & easy recipes. Start eating easy recipes with proper meal planning and grocery shopping.
We offer lots of quick recipes:
Cook tasty fast recipes at home using bisquick, vegetable oil, pumpkin puree & dill. Recipes for classic beginner dishes like apple & celeriac soup, mojito grilled chicken, bourbon bbq glazed pork chops, grilled portuguese sardines and classic meatballs are available in the app. Our favourite easy recipes include broccoli soup, chocolate cake, mushroom & potato soup, and grandma's chicken noodle soup.
Our quick recipe app gives you lots of free cooking recipes for salad, drink, soup etc. Now that you've our fast recipes app, you no longer need to carry around bulky recipe books.
Start cooking with our free recipes app today.
